modules.title: Before you begin
modules.description: Before you can improve your site's performance, make sure you have already added that site to Cloudflare.

pages.additional_description: Cloudflare provides [lightning fast DNS resolution](/dns/), so you likely will see speed improvements by onboarding your domain to Cloudflare.

modules.title: Optimizations - One click needed
modules.description: Once your domain is onboarded and your DNS records are [proxied through Cloudflare](/dns/manage-dns-records/reference/proxied-dns-records/), Cloudflare offers the following one-click optimizations for speeding up your site:

pages.additional_description: Remove unnecessary characters from HTML, JavaScript, and CSS files.
Apply gzip and brotli compression to some types of content.
Defer JavaScript loading until after page content (applied through client-side JavaScript).
Accelerate page load times by using a faster protocol for HTTP.
Route requests across the fastest network path available.
Lazy load all images in a browser (applied through client-side JavaScript).

By using Bulk Redirects or [Page Rules](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/articles/4729826525965) for URL forwarding, you can perform redirects at Cloudflare’s edge network instead of making requests travel all the way to your origin server.
With a few clicks, you can also adjust your cache settings to make resources more cacheable and improve cache hit rates.

modules.title: Explore dedicated speed products
modules.description: Cloudflare offers several dedicated products to improve the performance of your website.

pages.additional_description: Choose between Cloudflare Images, Cloudflare Image Resizing, and Polish, three products tailored to your different image needs.
Maximize application performance and availability by distributing traffic across your servers.
Connect your network infrastructure directly with Cloudflare – rather than using the public Internet – for a more reliable and secure experience.
Deploy your dynamic front-end applications using Cloudflare Pages. Pages are super fast, always up to date, and deployed directly from your Git provider.
Cloudflare Stream lets you or your end users upload, store, encode, and deliver live and on-demand video with one API, without configuring or maintaining infrastructure.
Maintain performance during traffic overloads by routing excess users away from your application and into a queue.
Increase speed and security for Web3 apps using our IPFS and Ethereum gateways.
Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
Load third-party tools without slowing down your website.
